item.description:
Android 1 is the first major version of the Android operating system developed by Google. It was released on September 23, 2008, and was the first version to be officially branded as "Android". Android 1 was based on the Linux kernel version 2.6.25 and included many new features, such as the ability to run multiple applications at the same time, a virtual machine for running Dalvik bytecode, and a new user interface based on the Holo design language.
